actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 97-136.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of (H.R. 3023) to authorize appropriations to the Department of Energy for fiscal year 1982, for conservation, exploration, development, production, sale, and use of the naval petroleum reserves and naval oil shale reserves.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 3023 (Dept. of Energy funding).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of (H.R. 3023) to authorize appropriations to the Department of Energy for fiscal year 1982, for conservation, exploration, development, production, sale, and use of the naval petroleum reserves and naval oil shale reserves.
